title: Textile, "Decided", 1950–55
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: screen printed on plain weave
description: White ground with large-scale design of squares within squares in gray and black printed in wide intervals. Inspired by a painting by Joseph Albers owned by Arundell Clarke.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Decided", 1950–55.
1950–55. Medium: linen
Technique: screen printed on plain weave. Gift of Arundell Clarke. 1956-150-5.
